features: CURVED DESIGN: 32 Inch Full HD (1920x1080p) 1500R curved gaming monitor with thin bezels
MAXIMIZED GAMEPLAY: 165Hz refresh rate and 1ms MPRT response time (with DisplayPort) for ultimate gaming experience
ULTRA-SMOOTH GAMING: AMD FreeSync Premium technology enables fluid and tear-free gameplay
ENHANCED VIEWING COMFORT: Flicker-Free technology and Blue Light Filter for reduced eye fatigue
GAME ON: An arsenal of pre-set customizable visual modes keeps you ready for any FPS, RTS, or MOBA games
body.description: With an immersive 1500R curved screen and Full HD 1080p resolution, the ViewSonic® VX3218-PC-MHD monitor provides an incredible viewing experience for work or play. With features including a high 165Hz* refresh rate, 1ms (MPRT) response time and adaptive sync technology, this monitor virtually eliminates screen tearing and stuttering for a fluid gaming experience. The VX3218-PC-MHD also comes equipped with ViewSonic exclusive ViewMode™ presets, which offer optimized screen performance for different home entertainment applications such as watching movies, editing files, or playing video games. Two HDMI (v1.4) inputs, and one DisplayPort (v1.2) input offers flexible connectivity for both general use and entertainment. *165Hz refresh rate with DisplayPort.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ViewSonic VX3218-PC-MHD Curved Gaming For the Modern Gamer

Immersive Curved Screen Design A sleek, concave screen with ultra-thin bezels delivers an incredibly immersive viewing experience with panoramic images, vivid color, and incredible detail. 165Hz Refresh Rate With a swift 165Hz refresh rate, this monitor delivers smooth frame loading and breathtaking graphics no matter how quickly the in-game action unfolds. Rapid Response Time With a 1ms (MPRT) response time, this monitor delivers smooth images without streaking, blurring or ghosting. Built-in varying response rates automatically correct overshooting and motion blur. Smooth & Fluid Gaming With VESA Adaptive-Sync connectivity, this AMD FreeSync Premium monitor seamlessly synchronizes the frame rate output between your graphics card and monitor to easily eliminate image tearing. Optimized View Settings Choose from “Game,” “Movie,” “Web,” “Text,” and “Mono” presets with ViewMode. These presets enhance gamma curve, color temperature, contrast and brightness for an incredible viewing experience.

Stunning HD Resolution Enjoy a premium viewing experience with stunning Full HD resolution – almost twice as powerful as standard HD resolution. Loaded with Connectivity DisplayPort and HDMI inputs give you the freedom and flexibility to connect to a variety of devices such as gaming consoles, laptops and more. Ultra-Wide Viewing Angles Next generation viewing technology creates an ultrawide 178° field of view so you never to have to miss another shot, picture or moment. Frameless Design Enjoy a stunning multi-monitor viewing experience and see more of what matters with a sleek almost frameless design.

Previous page Eye Care Flicker-Free and Blue Light Filter help to reduce eye fatigue over extended periods of viewing. VESA Compatible Mount Mount the monitor as you see fit using its convenient VESA-compatible mount design. Next page 1 Eye Care 2 VESA Mount

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect monitor for pc
reviews.reviewText: I stream on twitch and YouTube doing gaming tournaments and this monitor has incredible refresh rates / perfect color /great design definitely a sound investment

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great monitor with high 4K resolution
reviews.reviewText: I love the subtle curve on this monitor and its 31 inch size. Its been a big improvement over my 24 inch. It plays video perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent monitor, but don’t buy it for the speakers
reviews.reviewText: This monitor looks great, but if you’re going to put speakers in a monitor at all, at least make them decent 5-watt speakers, because these 2-watt speakers are deficient by any reasonable measure. With that said, you won’t get the most out of these speakers unless you understand that the speaker volume in the monitor settings (accessible ONLY via the buttons on the back right bottom corner) adjusts INDEPENDENTLY of your computer volume settings. Turn the volume all the way up in the volume settings for the monitor AND the computer AND the app or website generating the sound. Then you’ll have volume you can at least hear, even if it’s not satisfying volume and sound quality. Personally, I plug headphones into the mini stereo jack and use those (for which you STILL need the volume all the way up in the monitor volume settings).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very big… (For gamers and streamers)
reviews.reviewText: Gives a lot a hertz, 120 fps if you have PS5. Recommend if you are a gamer or streamer myself. 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice monitor for the price
reviews.reviewText: The picture is as good as the price. My only issue is the display controls are a little confusing because they are on the back where you have to feel your way around to control the menu. It would be nice if they had directional marks on the side of the screen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This is the worst monitor I've ever used
reviews.reviewText: It was challenging to set up, in part because the instructions don't match the product. It is flimsy and top-heavy, toppling off the desk a few times in the two months I've had it. The picture quality is trash. The UX is puzzling. And it doesn't work. The first time it stopped working for a shift, my cat walked by it. Today, it just won't switch on after sitting by itself in a shut office for the weekend. Anything that touches the extremely inconveniently placed cables cuts the picture out for a few minutes -- if you can get a picture at all. Save your money. Buy elsewhere. UGH.
monitor molto interessante, buone prestazioni e ottimo rapporto qualità/prezzo. consigliato
My son purchased it for use with a new computer. He loves it. And the price was excellent.
Muy buena resolución y claridad en la imagen
